name: Infinia
headline: Real Time Payments infraestructure
description: Infinia is enabling Fintechs, PSPs and Banks to connect to RTP rails both for payins and payouts globally. Ianai, the CEO, is the former Global VP of Partnerships at dLocal and grew the company from $0 to $100M ARR.

founders.name: Ianai Urwicz, Founder
founders.description:
Former d-local (NASDAQ: DLO) VP Sales and Partnership, I have been working in the Fintech industry for more than 10 years. 
Tech early adopter. Half Israeli- half Latino.

founders.name: Alejandro Rettig, Founder
founders.description:
25+ years of experience in the Fintech & Telecom market, including R&D, product management,  project management, and sales.

Passionate about technology, always innovates and improves the processes and the business.
Proven experience managing teams and creating more than 50 products/services, that were deployed in customers across Latin America, Africa and Asia.

Specialties: Product Creation, Design and Development, Research, Innovation, Team Management, Project Management, Sales and Pre/Sales.

# Tu socio para pagos en tiempo real a nivel global
## Mueve dinero sin problemas entre monedas locales y criptomonedas, agilizando las operaciones a través de LATAM y mercados globales.
[COMIENZA HOY](https://www.infiniaweb.com/<https:/www.infiniaweb.com/contact-us>)
## Revoluciona la manera de mover dinero globalmente
### Soluciones poderosas para pagos, verificación y cumplimiento a través de fronteras y monedas.
[](https://www.infiniaweb.com/<https:/www.infiniaweb.com/payins>)
##### [PAYINS](https://www.infiniaweb.com/<https:/www.infiniaweb.com/payins>)
[Pagos de clientes optimizados](https://www.infiniaweb.com/<https:/www.infiniaweb.com/payins>)
[Permite que tus clientes paguen con su método preferido, ya sea fiat o criptomonedas, mientras recibes los fondos de manera rápida y segura.](https://www.infiniaweb.com/<https:/www.infiniaweb.com/payins>)
[](https://www.infiniaweb.com/<https:/www.infiniaweb.com/payins>)
[](https://www.infiniaweb.com/<https:/www.infiniaweb.com/payouts>)
##### [PAYOUTS](https://www.infiniaweb.com/<https:/www.infiniaweb.com/payouts>)
[Desembolsos rápidos y confiables](https://www.infiniaweb.com/<https:/www.infiniaweb.com/payouts>)
[Entrega fondos a merchants, socios o clientes, en tiempo real, minimizando retrasos y mejorando la satisfacción.](https://www.infiniaweb.com/<https:/www.infiniaweb.com/payouts>)
[](https://www.infiniaweb.com/<https:/www.infiniaweb.com/payouts>)
[](https://www.infiniaweb.com/<https:/www.infiniaweb.com/compliance>)
##### [COMPLIANCE](https://www.infiniaweb.com/<https:/www.infiniaweb.com/compliance>)
[Cumplimiento simplificado](https://www.infiniaweb.com/<https:/www.infiniaweb.com/compliance>)
[Simplifica los requisitos regulatorios con verificación integrada para identidad, cuentas bancarias y edad.](https://www.infiniaweb.com/<https:/www.infiniaweb.com/compliance>)
[](https://www.infiniaweb.com/<https:/www.infiniaweb.com/compliance>)
Descubre nuestra API
Explora nuestra API segura y RESTful y descubre cómo puede potenciar tus soluciones de pago.
[[Ver Documentación →]](https://www.infiniaweb.com/<https:/docs.infiniaweb.com/reference/introduction>)

## RTP diseñado para todas las industrias
### Desde industrias dinámicas hasta necesidades de pago complejas, ofrecemos soluciones personalizadas que impulsan el crecimiento y la innovación.
[Fintech](https://www.infiniaweb.com/<https:/www.infiniaweb.com/fintech>)
Optimiza los pagos con soluciones en tiempo real adaptadas para proveedores de servicios financieros.
[](https://www.infiniaweb.com/<https:/www.infiniaweb.com/fintech>)
[Marketplaces & Plataformas](https://www.infiniaweb.com/<https:/www.infiniaweb.com/marketplaces>)
Permite transacciones fluidas para marketplaces, plataformas de suscripción y negocios multiside.
[](https://www.infiniaweb.com/<https:/www.infiniaweb.com/marketplaces>)
[iGaming](https://www.infiniaweb.com/<https:/www.infiniaweb.com/igaming>)
Ofrece pagos rápidos y conformes para la industria del juego y entretenimiento.
[](https://www.infiniaweb.com/<https:/www.infiniaweb.com/igaming>)
[Otros](https://www.infiniaweb.com/<https:/www.infiniaweb.com/other-industries>)
Explora cómo apoyamos diversas industrias con soluciones de pago diseñadas para adaptarse y crecer.
[](https://www.infiniaweb.com/<https:/www.infiniaweb.com/other-industries>)
## Pagos sin fronteras, cobertura sin límites
### Con cobertura en el mercado global y el mejor alcance en LATAM para pagos en tiempo real, conectamos oportunidades de manera fluida entre regiones, monedas y sistemas. ​ ​Proveedor de Servicios de Iniciación de Pagos (PISP) AUTORIZADO
[Ver Cobertura y Certificaciones](https://www.infiniaweb.com/<https:/www.infiniaweb.com/coverage>)

generated_description:
Infinia is a fintech startup founded in 2022, currently part of Y Combinator's Winter 2023 batch. At its core, Infinia aims to revolutionize the payments landscape by building a robust real-time payments (RTP) infrastructure tailored for fintechs, payment service providers (PSPs), and banks. With a mission to connect these entities to RTP rails for both payins and payouts on a global scale, Infinia is designed to simplify transactions, whether in local currencies or cryptocurrencies.

The company is headed by CEO Ianai, who brings impressive credentials to the table as the former Global VP of Partnerships at dLocal, where he successfully scaled the company from zero to $100 million in annual recurring revenue (ARR). Under Ianai’s leadership, Infinia is not only delivering strong technology solutions but is also shaping the future of financial transactions.

Despite being a small team of just three, Infinia packs a punch, offering a variety of services that include efficient payins, reliable payouts, and simplified compliance processes. They cater to diverse industries, from fintech to iGaming, demonstrating flexibility and innovation in addressing complex payment needs. 

Some highlights from Infinia's offerings include:
- **Payins**: Allowing customers to pay using their preferred method, whether fiat or cryptocurrencies, while ensuring quick and secure transactions.
- **Payouts**: Responsible for the rapid and reliable disbursement of funds to merchants and clients, enhancing overall satisfaction by minimizing delays.
- **Compliance**: Providing integrated verification processes to help clients navigate regulatory requirements easily.

Infinia's broader vision encompasses smoother money movement across LATAM markets and beyond, creating frictionless opportunities for growth. The company counts on backing from notable partners, including Microsoft for Startups and Mastercard Start Path, establishing a solid foundation for its operations.

For more details, you can explore Infinia’s website at [Infinia Web](https://www.infiniaweb.com). 

In sum, Infinia is a forward-thinking startup poised to reshape payment infrastructures globally, leveraging deep industry insights and an agile approach to meet the evolving demands of the financial landscape.
